Order a Resizing

Have you decided you want to get your titanium ring resized? Because each titanium ring is custom-sized, we need more information before we can give you an exact cost. We’ll respond with a price quote and more information. Contacting us does not obligate you to order from us.

Please note that we may not be able to resize titanium rings with tension-set stones. All rings receive complimentary inside-ring engraving.

To begin your titanium ring resizing order, email us at info@titaniumresizing.com or call us at (800) 297-6707. Things to mention:

  • Whether you want your ring sized larger or smaller
  • Whether your ring has gemstones
  • If you would like a complimentary inside-ring engraving, the text of that engraving (you may also submit this later)
  • Any other questions or comments you have

Titanium Resizing by Exotica Jewelry

Chris and Sandy Boothe of Exotica Jewelry have been working with titanium jewelry for more than 25 years. Expert jewelers who handcraft their own line of titanium rings, Chris and Sandy can resize your ring in the tiniest increments. Learn more about Exotica Jewelry.

Titanium Wedding Rings

In addition to resizing titanium rings, Chris and Sandy Boothe have their own line of titanium wedding rings.

Titanium Beads

Chris and Sandy also handcraft titanium beads into earrings and necklaces.
